items.name: Update ethOS for Pixel 7 Compatibility
items.description: Make ethOS compatible with Pixel 7 devices

items.name: Establish Delightful Sales and Quality Distribution Process
items.description: Create a smooth process for ordering, sourcing, installation, branding, and fulfillment

description: The purpose of this proposal is to request a grant to launch ethOS devices for purchase. We have been building ethOS, a free and open source mobile OS that embraces Ethereum and makes Web3 delightful on mobile. Currently, using ethOS requires flashing an older Pixel device, which is a major impediment to adoption. With the grant, we plan to make ethOS available pre-installed on current Pixel 7s and establish a user-friendly sales process. The first ethOS device will also have a Nounish Edition to thank NounsDAO for their support.

project.name: ethOS
project.description: An open-source mobile operating system that embraces Ethereum and Web3.

title: ethOS: A crypto-native, mobile OS
